name: Assemblearning - Clamp
description:
Write a function `uint64_t clamp(uint64_t a, uint64_t lo, uint64_t hi)` which works as follows: if `a` compares less than `lo`, returns `lo`; otherwise if `hi` compares less than `a`, returns `hi`; otherwise returns `a`.

`a` is in the register `rdi`, `lo` is in the register `rsi`, `hi` is in the register `rdx`, result should be in `rax`.

Constraints: `0 <= (a, lo, hi) <= 2^64 - 1`, `lo <= hi`.
